original: Börjeson, Eric Gustaf, komminister. Lekåsa, f. 22/5/08 i Skara av Birger B. o. Runa Kiörck. G. 38 m. Brita Alida Eneroth. Barn: Lennart f. 41, Anders 45. ■— Teol. kand., prästv. f. Skara stift 34. Rektor v. h. folksk. i Grästorp 38-39, timlär. 39-41, e. o. ämneslär. v. folkhögsk. i Vara 29-30, kommin. i Lekåsa fr. 41. Ordf. i kyrkostämma o. skolråd.
translated: Börjeson, Eric Gustaf, minister. Born May 22, 1908 in Skara to Birger B. and Runa Kiörck. Married in 1938 to Brita Alida Eneroth. Children: Lennart born in 1941, Anders born in 1945. Earned a Bachelor of Theology degree and was ordained as a priest in Skara diocese in 1934. He served as a principal at a primary school in Grästorp from 1938 to 1939, and as a temporary teacher from 1939 to 1941. He was also an acting subject teacher at a folk high school in Vara in 1929 to 1930 prior to becoming a minister in Lekåsa from 1941. He was the chairman of the church congregation and school board.
